00023 #include <Discretisation_tools.h>
00024 #include <DoubleTrav.h>
00025 #include <Champ_base.h>
00026 #include <Zone_VF.h>
00027 #include <Debog.h>
00028 #include <Check_espace_virtuel.h>
00029 #include <cmath>
00030 
00031 void Discretisation_tools::nodes_to_cells(const Champ_base& Hn,  Champ_base& He)
00032 {
00033   const DoubleTab& tabHn=Hn.valeurs();
00034   DoubleTab& tabHe=He.valeurs();
00035   const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis_base=He.zone_dis_base();
00036 
00037   assert(tabHe.dimension_tot(0)==zone_dis_base.nb_elem_tot());
00038   assert(tabHn.dimension_tot(0)==zone_dis_base.nb_som_tot());
00039 
00040   const IntTab& les_elems=zone_dis_base.zone().les_elems();
00041   int nb_som_elem=les_elems.dimension(1);
00042   int nb_elem=zone_dis_base.nb_elem();
00043 
00044   tabHe=0;
00045   for (int ele=0; ele<nb_elem; ele++)
00046     {
00047       for (int s=0; s<nb_som_elem; s++)
00048         {
00049           int sglob=les_elems(ele,s);
00050           tabHe(ele)+=tabHn(sglob);
00051         }
00052     }
00053   double inv_nb_som_elem=1./(nb_som_elem);
00054   tabHe*=inv_nb_som_elem;
00055   tabHe.echange_espace_virtuel();
00056 }
00057 void Discretisation_tools::cells_to_nodes(const Champ_base& He,  Champ_base& Hn)
00058 {
00059 
00060   DoubleTab& tabHn=Hn.valeurs();
00061   const DoubleTab& tabHe=He.valeurs();
00062   Debog::verifier("elno entreee",tabHe);
00063   assert_espace_virtuel_vect(tabHe);
00064   const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis_base=He.zone_dis_base();
00065 
00066   assert(tabHe.dimension_tot(0)==zone_dis_base.nb_elem_tot());
00067   assert(tabHn.dimension_tot(0)==zone_dis_base.nb_som_tot());
00068 
00069   const IntTab& les_elems=zone_dis_base.zone().les_elems();
00070   const DoubleVect& volumes=ref_cast(Zone_VF,zone_dis_base).volumes();
00071 
00072   tabHn=0;
00073   DoubleTrav vsom(tabHn.dimension_tot(0));
00074   int nb_som_elem=les_elems.dimension(1);
00075   int nb_elem_tot=zone_dis_base.nb_elem_tot();
00076   int N = tabHn.line_size();
00077 
00078   for (int e = 0; e < nb_elem_tot; e++)
00079     for (int s = 0; s < nb_som_elem; s++)
00080       {
00081         int sglob = les_elems(e, s);
00082         for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00083           tabHn(sglob, n) += tabHe(e, n) * volumes(e);
00084         vsom(sglob) += volumes(e);
00085       }
00086 
00087   for (int s = 0; s < zone_dis_base.nb_som(); s++)
00088     for (int n = 0; n < N; n++)
00089       tabHn(s, n) /= vsom(s);
00090 
00091   tabHn.echange_espace_virtuel();
00092   Debog::verifier("elno sortie",tabHn);
00093 }
00094 void Discretisation_tools::faces_to_cells(const Champ_base& Hf,  Champ_base& He)
00095 {
00096   const DoubleTab& tabHf=Hf.valeurs();
00097   DoubleTab& tabHe=He.valeurs();
00098   const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis_base=He.zone_dis_base();
00099   const Zone_VF& zone_vf= ref_cast(Zone_VF,zone_dis_base);
00100   assert(tabHe.dimension_tot(0)==zone_dis_base.nb_elem_tot());
00101   assert(tabHf.dimension_tot(0)==zone_vf.nb_faces_tot());
00102 
00103   const IntTab& elem_faces=zone_vf.elem_faces();
00104   int nb_face_elem=elem_faces.dimension(1);
00105   int nb_elem=zone_dis_base.nb_elem();
00106 
00107   tabHe=0;
00108   for (int ele=0; ele<nb_elem; ele++)
00109     {
00110       for (int s=0; s<nb_face_elem; s++)
00111         {
00112 
00113           tabHe(ele)+=tabHf(elem_faces(ele,s));
00114         }
00115     }
00116   double inv_nb_face_elem=1./(nb_face_elem);
00117   tabHe*=inv_nb_face_elem;
00118   tabHe.echange_espace_virtuel();
00119 }
00120 void Discretisation_tools::cells_to_faces(const Champ_base& He,  Champ_base& Hf)
00121 {
00122 
00123   DoubleTab& tabHf=Hf.valeurs();
00124   const DoubleTab& tabHe=He.valeurs();
00125   Debog::verifier("element_face entreee",tabHe);
00126   assert_espace_virtuel_vect(tabHe);
00127   const Zone_dis_base& zone_dis_base=He.zone_dis_base();
00128 
00129   const Zone_VF& zone_vf= ref_cast(Zone_VF,zone_dis_base);
00130 // en realite on fait P1B vers face
00131 // assert(tabHe.dimension_tot(0)==zone_dis_base.nb_elem_tot());
00132   assert(tabHf.dimension_tot(0)==zone_vf.nb_faces_tot());
00133 
00134   const IntTab& elem_faces=zone_vf.elem_faces();
00135   const DoubleVect& volumes=zone_vf.volumes();
00136   const DoubleVect& volumes_entrelaces=zone_vf.volumes_entrelaces();
00137 
00138   tabHf=0;
00139   int nb_face_elem=elem_faces.dimension(1);
00140   int nb_elem_tot=zone_dis_base.nb_elem_tot();
00141 
00142   double coeffb=nb_face_elem;
00143   double coeffi=coeffb;
00144   if (zone_vf.que_suis_je()=="Zone_VDF")
00145     {
00146       coeffb=1;
00147       coeffi=2;
00148     }
00149 
00150 // TODO : FIXME
00151 // XXX : codage pas coherent... à voir : volumes ou volumes_entrelaces ???
00152   if (tabHe.line_size() == 1)
00153     {
00154       DoubleTab vol_tot(tabHf);
00155       for (int ele=0; ele<nb_elem_tot; ele++)
00156         for (int s=0; s<nb_face_elem; s++)
00157           {
00158             tabHf(elem_faces(ele,s))+=tabHe(ele,0)*volumes(ele);
00159             vol_tot(elem_faces(ele,s)) += volumes(ele);
00160           }
00161       for (int f = 0; f < zone_vf.nb_faces(); f++)
00162         tabHf(f) /= vol_tot(f);
00163     }
00164   else
00165     {
00166 // TODO : factorize these cases ...
00167       if (tabHf.nb_dim()==1)
00168         {
00169           assert(coeffi==2);
00170           assert(coeffb==1);
00171 // VDF
00172 // abort();
00173           for (int ele=0; ele<nb_elem_tot; ele++)
00174             {
00175               for (int s=0; s<nb_face_elem; s++)
00176                 {
00177                   int face=elem_faces(ele,s);
00178                   for (int r = 0; r < zone_vf.dimension; r++)
00179                     {
00180 // Change of basis N.K.N, with N the normal of the face, and K the tensorial coefficient to get the value of the diffusivity
00181 // on the direction of the surface normal.
00182                       double normOnSurf = zone_vf.face_normales(face, r) / zone_vf.face_surfaces(face);
00183                       tabHf(face) += tabHe(ele, r) * normOnSurf * normOnSurf * volumes(ele);
00184                     }
00185                 }
00186             }
00187           for (int f=0; f<zone_vf.premiere_face_int(); f++)
00188             tabHf(f)/=volumes_entrelaces(f)*coeffb;
00189           for (int f=zone_vf.premiere_face_int(); f<zone_vf.nb_faces(); f++)
00190             tabHf(f)/=volumes_entrelaces(f)*coeffi;
00191         }
00192       else
00193         {
00194 // abort();
00195           int nb_comp=tabHf.dimension(1);
00196           for (int ele=0; ele<nb_elem_tot; ele++)
00197             {
00198               for (int s=0; s<nb_face_elem; s++)
00199                 {
00200                   int face=elem_faces(ele,s);
00201                   for (int comp=0; comp<nb_comp; comp++)
00202                     tabHf(face,comp)+=tabHe(ele,comp)*volumes(ele);
00203                 }
00204             }
00205 
00206           for (int f=0; f<zone_vf.premiere_face_int(); f++)
00207             for (int comp=0; comp<nb_comp; comp++)
00208               tabHf(f,comp)/=volumes_entrelaces(f)*coeffb;
00209           for (int f=zone_vf.premiere_face_int(); f<zone_vf.nb_faces(); f++)
00210             for (int comp=0; comp<nb_comp; comp++)
00211               tabHf(f,comp)/=volumes_entrelaces(f)*coeffi;
00212 
00213         }
00214     }
00215   tabHf.echange_espace_virtuel();
00216 // Cerr<<min_array(tabHe)<<" elem  "<<max_array(tabHe)<<finl;
00217 // Cerr<<min_array(tabHf)<<" face  "<<max_array(tabHf)<<finl;
00218 
00219   Debog::verifier("element_face sortie",tabHf);
00220 }
